techmeme.title: Sony announces the PS5 Pro, offering a better GPU and faster memory for up to 45% faster game rendering, but no disc drive, available from November 7 for $700 (Scott Stein/CNET)
Election officials across the US say false election rumors spread by Elon Musk to his 197M+ followers often coincide with calls by locals to purge voter rolls (Washington Post)
Sources: OpenAI aims to release Strawberry, its reasoning-focused AI, within two weeks as a model that users can pick in ChatGPT; the model isn't yet multimodal (The Information)
Glean, which uses AI to offer unified search across apps used at a company, raised $260M+ at a $4.6B valuation, after raising $200M+ at $2.2B in February 2024 (Amy Thomson/Bloomberg)
Israel-based Quantum Source, which is developing a photonic quantum computer, raised a $50M Series A led by Eclipse, bringing its total funding to $77M (Meytal Vaizberg/Globes Online)
